db:abstract.db:para: A component to decorate hyperlinks on a PDF page.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: PdfLinkDelegate provides the component that QML-based PDF viewers instantiate on top of each hyperlink that is found on each PDF page.

This component does not provide any visual decoration, because often the hyperlinks will already be formatted in a distinctive way; but when the mouse cursor hovers, it changes to Qt::PointingHandCursor, and a tooltip appears after a delay. Clicking emits the goToLocation() signal if the link is internal, or calls Qt.openUrlExternally() if the link contains a URL.

db:section.db:title: contextMenuRequested(link)
db:section.db:para: Emitted on mouse right-click or touch long-press. The link argument is an instance of QPdfLink with information about the hyperlink.

db:section.db:title: tapped(link)
db:section.db:para: Emitted on mouse click or touch tap. The link argument is an instance of QPdfLink with information about the hyperlink.
